message.entry: Maximum value specified in the range vector must be greater than or equal to the minimum value.
Marker IDs must be between 0 and {1} for "{0}" marker family.
RefineCorners must be set to true when using the {0} argument.
Image width must be greater than or equal to ChArUco board width. Increase image width or reduce checker size.
Image height must be greater than or equal to ChArUco board height. Increase image height or reduce checker size.
Image width and height must each have at least {0} pixels for the provided ChArUco board properties.
Marker size must be less than checker size. Reduce marker size or increase checker size.
Marker IDs must be between 0 and {1} for "{0}" marker family. Reduce minimum marker ID.
Number of rows of the ChArUco board, dim1, must be even when OriginCheckerColor is white.
C/C++ code generation is not supported for detecting ChArUco board with white OriginCheckerColor.
